title: STORCK Bicycle x Porsche Digital collaborate on new Cyklaer e-bike brand w/ digital rear view mirror!
content:
Over the years, the Porsche name has been associated with a number of different bicyclesâ€”from e-bikes carrying the brand name to one-off customs meant to honor production vehicles. Now, Porsche Digital has partnered with performance German bike builder STORCK to deliver a new line of commuter e-bikes and coin a new brand: Cyklaer. The unusual

The post STORCK Bicycle x Porsche Digital collaborate on new Cyklaer e-bike brand w/ digital rear view mirror! appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Sam Anderson
